channel.title: Wilderness Help?
channel.description:
Okay, I am curently trying to make it so that all the areas of my server are non-wilderness except for the wilderness itself. Obviously to prevent people from pking in my home area, shopping area etc. Is this possible? Example: Falador, Varrock, Edgeville, Ardougne, Lumbridge, Catherby etc. are non-wilderness and the wilderness remains the wilderness.
Additional Info: I am using a blank source and it is a 317 server. More Info: Not sure whether this may help or not but my home area is at edgeville bank.
Thanks for reading, hope you can help. :confused: I figured it out now.....i took the coordinates from another source.
